overview: Praveen Sanker has technical expertise in Cloud computing, middleware/web services, application networking & storage and grid computing. He has around 10 years of experience in different networking technologies. Praveen focuses in developing IT Infrastructure Management and Delivery. He has also considerable expertise in Server consolidation with Virtualization techniques to reduce Total Cost of Ownership (TCO), providing highly scalable infrastructure environment. He has worked both in India and Middle-East. Praveen was earlier working at Flytxt Technology Pvt. Ltd as the Office IT Manager, where he was responsible for the Design and implementation of IT Infrastructure and Management.
